contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox person | name = Joe Viterelli | image = | caption = | birth_name = Joseph Viterelli | birth_date = {{Birth date|1937|3|10}} | birth_place = [[The Bronx, New York]], U.S. | death_date = {{Death date and age|2004|1|28|1937|3|10}} | death_place = [[Las Vegas, Nevada]], U.S. | years_active = 1990–2002 | occupation = Actor | spouse = Catherine Brennan (19??-2004; his death)}} {{Onesource|date=February 2012}} '''Joseph "Joe" Viterelli''' (March 10, 1937 â€“ January 28, 2004) was an American actor. Joe Viterelli was born to [[Italian language|Italian]] immigrants in [[the Bronx]], [[New York]]. Before Viterelli became an actor, he had befriended director [[Leo Penn]] (actor [[Sean Penn]]'s father), who initially tried but failed to persuade Viterelli to pursue acting because of his unique and typically Italian looks. Some years later, Sean Penn approached Viterelli and asked him to try out for a part as a favor; Viterelli did and went on to appear in ''[[State of Grace (film)|State of Grace]]'' and then in over 40 other movies. ==Death== Viterelli died on January 28, 2004, aged 66, in [[Las Vegas, Nevada]] due to a severe stomach [[hemorrhage]], a complication of just-completed heart surgery. His last film role was as "Jelly" in [[Harold Ramis]]'s ''[[Analyze That]]''.; his final acting credit was as a mobster in a 2004 [[Super Bowl]] ad for [[Staples, Inc.]] ==Partial filmography== *2002 - ''[[Analyze That]]'' .... Jelly *2001 - ''[[See Spot Run]]'' .... Gino *2001 - ''[[Shallow Hal]]'' ... Steve Shanahan *1999 - ''[[Mickey Blue Eyes]]'' .... Vinnie D'Agostino *1999 - ''[[Analyze This]]'' .... Jelly *1998 - ''[[Mafia!]]''....Dominick Clamatto *1996 - ''[[Heaven's Prisoners]]'' .... *1996 - ''[[Eraser (film)|Eraser]]'' .... Tony Two-Toes *1994 - ''[[Bullets Over Broadway]]'' .... Nick Valenti *1993 - ''[[The Firm (1993 film)|The Firm]]'' .... Joey Morolto *1991 - ''[[Mobsters]]'' ... [[Joe Profaci]] *1990 - ''[[State of Grace (film)|State of Grace]]'' .... Borelli ==External links== *{{IMDb name|0899995}} *{{findagrave|8401280}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Viterelli, Joe | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = Viterelli, Joseph | SHORT DESCRIPTION = American actor | DATE OF BIRTH = March 10, 1937 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[New York City, New York]], U.S. | DATE OF DEATH = January 28, 2004 | PLACE OF DEATH = [[Las Vegas, Nevada]], U.S.}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Viterelli, Joe}} [[Category:1937 births]] [[Category:2004 deaths]] [[Category:Actors from New York City]] [[Category:American film actors]] [[Category:American television actors]] [[Category:People from the Bronx]] [[Category:American people of Italian descent]] [[Category:Deaths from surgical complications]] [[Category:Disease-related deaths in Nevada]] {{US-actor-stub}}
